data.title: Bring Back My Love Spell
data.subtitle: To bring back an ex-lover or end an argument between friends.

data.title: Break up Candle Spell
data.subtitle: Simple break up spell, best done on the full to new moon.

data.title: Make Him Love Me
data.subtitle: This is a potent attraction spell.

data.title: To Attract True Love
data.subtitle: This spell will bring love to you!

data.title: Think About Me
data.subtitle: This is a spell to attract the one you desire.

data.title: Innocent Attraction
data.subtitle: This spell will make the person you cast it upon like you as much as you like him.

data.title: Increase your Attractiveness
data.subtitle: Good spell to use before a date, it helps you to enhance your physical beauty

data.title: Make Him Love You
data.subtitle: A spell to make that someone like you.

data.title: The Wedding Ring Spell
data.subtitle: When you are attracted to someone but the attraction does not seem to be mutual.

data.title: Lost love spell
data.subtitle: You can use this spell to try and reunite with your lost love.
